page.title: 01LEISURE IN OAKENGATES
page.content:
Oakengates Leisure Centre. __________________________ At the Centre,which opened in 1975, there are between 7 and 8 Recreation Assistants. Jeff Jones, who is one, told us about it. The swimming pool is 25m by 9m and it holds 80,000 gallons of water. You can do: badminton, netball, cricket swimming, canoeing, football, hockey, table-tennis, basketball, volleyball, tennis, trampolining, weight -training and athletics.
Oakengates Library. ___________________ The library in Limes Walk is run by Mrs.Picken for 4430 local members. It has a stock of 13000 books to lend. Adult fiction is the most popular type of book lent. A computer system is used to issue books.
